name: Hit Click Sci-Fi
description:
Hi, Welcome! I'm glad that you clicked in my thumbnail from my Game in Itch.io. 
My name is Rômulo Franco, and this is my first Indie project that i posted on a indie game development blog. As you could see in the title, my game is called HitClick Sci-fi. A game project that i worked for my Game Design University. I hope you enjoy my game that was made in a few months. He's current in beta, so more updates will come soon.
